list_of_reviews.review_title: I have been trying to get my money…
list_of_reviews.review: I have been trying to get my money returned for days. After multiple attempts, Coinbase refuses to “allow” me to withdraw funds to my bank account. They are holding me hostage for over 45 days, preventing me from receiving my money. Worst customer service. I believe they are intentionally holding funds for nefarious purposes. Complete fraud! Reported to FTC and will now send to FBI. They have zero credibility. No cause to hold money that doesn’t belong to them!!

Signed up worked well for a few days, then nothing. The site doesn't let you purchase bitcoin with a debit card a I did with my first few transactions. Customer service is non existent with the exception of the do it yourself Library. Very disappointing. I am now looking for another exchange that has reachable customer service. I have no confidence in COINBASE.

The absolute worst customer support. I've been trying to get my ID verified on my web3 wallet for 2 weeks. I get told something different by the reps every single day. It's madness. Coinbase is literally stealing all my money!

There's an old account with an invalid phone number and $250 of BTC IN it. I can't access it .I was told to resubmit identity verification, which I had already passed. After 26 tries, I realized that I was deliberately blocked.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Coinbase closed my account and then…
list_of_reviews.review: Coinbase closed my account and then refused to tell me the reason. I have never conducted illegal activities or anything else but Coinbase said due to privacy reasons they can't tell me why they closed the account. Would not recommend.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange is a literal scam
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange is a literal scam, how are they not out of business or at least investigated? I would give zero stars if I could. My account has been locked since February with funds still inside, made maybe five or so live chats and gave everything they needed to no avail, sad to see my funds go to waste though the fees are already horrible. Here is my case number just in case, #18609386

Although the technician was a little bit of a wise acre, he came through for me.This guy deserves a raise. I wish I could recall his name but he disconnected like the lone ranger.He told me that my phone is a subpar pixel and to stick with Motorola.I can't tell the difference. I just know that my app is fixed. Thanks.

an utter disgrace....reported them to the financial ombudsman just going to fill in the online form to report them for theft to the police.thieves. simple as that.6 days into a complaint and still no reply. no help, no customer service at all. only had a reply on twitter and spent over 6 hours now trying to open my account again....all I tried to do was change my phone number after it was smashed......this is the worst company I ever dealt with. three times they ask for personal info to confirm my id and unlock my account, three times they totally ignored it...there is no way to speak to coinbase, the phone lines are unmanned, they have no one to help, its jUST a massive fake husk of a company NEVER USE THEM YOU WILL REGRET IT.  put money in to a coinbase account? may as well burn the cash and cut out the stress of being robbed by faceless scammers.

Dont be fooled by the amount of users they have, there are much better exchanges out there, compared to bitpanda coinbase is like a high quality scam. Withdrawing my money was such a pain I gave up and kept it on coinbase, also fees are absolutely everywhere, i feel like ive been robbed to be honest.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This has been the worst experience of…
list_of_reviews.review: This has been the worst experience of my life.  I was hacked.  Trades done without my consent.  Talking to someone is impossible.  Been hung up on 6 times from "customer service".  Even my bank was hacked by them and they will not reply or respond.  I have sent in everything they have requested (4TIMES)..   HORRIBLE HORRIBLE people.  No one cares and no one follows up there.  Anyone  PLEASE HELP ME

Masters of scamming and gaslighting. I registered my account with these thieves years ago, I had my ex husband's last name back then, now I am divorced and back to my last name and Coinbase is using this as an opportunity to con me and say that they can't verify my identify because my current name doesn't match my previous name. Are  you kidding me ??? They have all my previous and current photo ids, they KNOW it's me but they just want to lock me out and keep my money. And of course their idiotic system doesn't have support or a solution for cases like mine because God forbid that would mean they would have to actually work to solve the issue instead of letting the whole system being run by a dumb AI.

Coinbase has manually reviewed my account and I have not been able to deposit or withdraw money to my account for about 7 months. I am a Celsius creditor and they last contacted me a few months ago. After that, Coinbase has not contacted me in any way.
My visit time with COINBASE.  What I was looking for went smoothly.To early to comment on anything else.

I've tried to signup and as expected (they're a financial institution and they need to) they've asked for address verification.Then they rejected 3 different types of PDFs because they're not in English. OOOFFF.I've signed up for Revolut, Wise, Payoneer and wherever else you may think of, I have never ever dealt with such a LOL situation before.What a joke.PS: I don't even know if it's legal to reject an EU language if you operate in EU, but I won't bother with that, I have better things to do.Edit:Are you trolling me? I've tried again to get the same story. "Unknown document submitted. Please submit one of the supported documents."I've uploaded an official, original untouched e-statement.Unbelievable.

Dear Coinbase team,I am getting very tired of receiving the same standardized responses. I have been waiting for my refund for 14 days now. The refund issuer has confirmed to me that the refund was successfully processed. I do not understand why such a large and reputable company has a problem with a refund for days. I urgently need the money for my livelihood.No, you don't understand. I urgently need the money. I know some refunds take time, but I am 28 years old and have never experienced this before. I have always received refunds within a day, no matter the company. I can't buy food with your apology. I am a Coinbase One customer and don't understand why you can't issue me the refund immediately.But it doesn’t help, no matter what I say or how I try to explain the situation. You keep responding with standard and same messages. I am very frustrated. Have a nice day...// after 15 days I received my money a few hours ago.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Spend 1000gbp to buy solana's and rip.
list_of_reviews.review: Spend 1000gbp to buy solana's, everything was okay till this moment, getting sms verifications and so on. The moment i spend the money in their website... BUMMM.. Cant transfer, cant withdraw, not receiving sms codes anymore, chat support is bot who is trying to convince u he's a real human and i spoke on the phone with them, 50% sure they were bots. Chat took the bot 2 hours to tell me he cannot do anything. 1 hour through the phone just because i closed the call. Can't login to my account. Literally wanted to move the solana today. If something will update but the customer support is SH!T!
they charge to much fees. if you deposit £50 but when you try to withdraw you will receive around £37 it's crazy.

Hi there, Coinbase is not allowing me to withdraw crypto to another exchange. I understand that every company has technical issues every now and then, but I made Coinbase aware of this problem months ago, and it still hasn’t been resolved. I was also taking to customer support for hours today, and they still can’t solve the problem. As a result of this, I have missed out on some great trading opportunities that would have made me thousands but I couldn’t take them because my funds are stuck on Coinbase. I am writing to you to give you the opportunity to give me a settlement to make up for the thousands of pounds I could have made through trading had I been able to withdraw my funds to Bitget, as well as the large amount of stress this situation has had on me. If you are not willing to do this I will have to report this issue to a small claims court. Please let me know as soon as possible as to your decision. Kind regards, Buddy
Good overview but high fees. Going to move to other broker if the dont lower their fees.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Never had an issue purchasing or…
list_of_reviews.review: Never had an issue purchasing or sending crypto. Coinbase One is a good addition too as I save a fortune using it.

There was a problem with my initial cash deposit due to my bank distrusting them, 875 days ago according to the Coinbase website. At the time they agreed to sell the crypto to recover the cost. The amount in question was $267.91. I went to use the account again today 3/8/24 for an unrelated transaction but there was a problem from their end. I was unaware they didn't sell the Bitcoin that they said they would. They bounced back 2 payments from me of $280 when I tried to bring the account back into credit. I spent almost 3 hours yesterday on their chat trying to deposit the money and another 4+hours today trying to get them to fix their stuff up. Got disconnected from the chat on 5 separate occasions, had a couple saying their were resolving it with the Escalations only to be disconnected. A day and a half later still nothing has happened and no-one has come back to me.

I was out of the country for 2 years. My cell phone had gotten disconnected and my email got hacked, so I am unable to log in. I have been calling on a daily, at least 2x a day and NO results with help for almost a month now. I have been a supportive member for almost 15 years and had recommended this platform to MANY friends and acquaintances. For this to happen, at the worse moment of my life right now is beyond disappointing. Please help steer me the right was to solve this problem. This company is awful. Refused to refund my funds. I would give a zero star if possible. Do not waste your hard earned money or time with this company. They come up with excuses to not refund money. I am reporting them to the federal trade commission to investigate their wrong doing. I encourage everyone else to report them also. If enough of us report them maybe something will be done when they start feeling the heat from federal authorities. Maybe we can get our money back from these crooks. Using on Android. Interface is clear and simple. Using it easy and you can change between advanced and simple mode seamlessly. Deposits seems very safe cos u can deposit straight from bank and it's fast.Only complain I got is pretty big trading fees if not using Coinbase one.So 4/5 for me.

I previously posted a review on this App/company, if anyone saw it, I would like to apologize. Although Coinbase did make me jump through quite a few hoops to move my own money, the final hangup where I thought they were just holding my funds hostage was due to my VPN. If you have any issues with transfers being considered "suspicious", disable your VPN. Coinbase's support was hella nice and dealt with my angry a** for like three hours. I'm still not a *huge* fan of Coinbase but their support team really did help me and made me feel like at the very least, they cared about my troubles. Aside from that, Coinbase has a ton of features and a generally simple yet attractive framework. The only complaint that I have left is that their fees are a bit high, but if you're like me and trade a lot/high values, it would be worth it to get the monthly subscription. I really want to reiterate, if I continued to have trouble withdrawing my money any longer than I did today, I would have never used Coinbase again. I want to personally thank Jannah and Yash (I think was his name.. I can't quite remember) from the Support team for helping me out. They REALLY did everything in their power to assist and that goes a long way with me.

Few days ago I received a notification on my phone that somebody sent ETH on his wallet without my permission. After I contact Coinbase asking them what was happened and at the end of the story they told me they can do anything and I should report the unauthorized transaction to the policy. I am not covered for a refund Coinbase? This is how you treat your customer? I then asked to close my account straight  away.

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I could give this company zero…
list_of_reviews.review: If I could give this company zero stars, I would. My experience with them has been nothing short of abysmal. Their customer service is an absolute joke, and I genuinely feel like I should sue them for their discriminatory practices.After being a loyal customer for three years, they suddenly decided to freeze my account, claiming they couldn't verify my identity because my address didn't match their records. The reason? I live in the UK but am a citizen of another country, and they demand that I have a UK passport to proceed. Despite having valid identification from my home country, they refused to accept it and had the audacity to suggest that I should "get a UK ID."This is blatant discrimination and should be pursued legally. I have never experienced such terrible treatment from any company before. If I had more time, I would take this to court, but for now, I'm left with a frozen account and wasted money.This company is an absolute disgrace, and I strongly advise everyone to steer clear. Trust me, you don’t want to go through the nightmare I did. Never again!

list_of_reviews.review_title: My Crypto Stolen From Supposed Coinbase Rep
list_of_reviews.review: I received a call from coinbase saying there had been an attempt to hack my account, a representative of coinbase will contact you shortly. Well I’m far away in Pennsylvania so this wasn’t possible but surely raised my concerns. He went on about what needs to be done which all sounded logical to me, transfer all of my funds from coinbase to my hard wallet. Then lock my coinbase account. Ok so I agreed obviously. So he walked me thru the process mainly because I’m not an expert in crypto, he had access to my coinbase account because he actually gave me my balance. So I trusted him. I copied and pasted the hashtag to send it to my wallet. Long story short it never happened and when I contacted coinbase they said they can’t do anything about it but here is the address it went to which did not match the one I gave. I filed a complaint with IC3 but haven’t received any response yet. I don’t know where to turn to now. I trusted Coinbase but now they let me down in a very bad way.

would give -zero, still haven't given me my money back, closed my account saying 'numerous attempts to contact me'. Not true. I have not one email of this from them. Like seriously, come up with another solution, you've tried this 14 times it obviously does not work. Next step will have to be an official complaint, and then legal action, as I have exhausted all options, and no one at Coinbase seems to care or are able to offer any working solutions to something that litterally anywhere else is a trivial issue, quickly solved by customer support.

BTW, customer service, when they pick up, steers me to a sight, that has veered me to 0 resolutions. It's been 1 thing after another. list_of_reviews.review_title: I decided to use Coinbase several weeks…
list_of_reviews.review: I decided to use Coinbase several weeks ago to purchase $3K of bitcoin. After that, I planned to send all of the crypto to a trusted wallet (Exodus) for safekeeping. But delays due to Coinbase's ineptitude prevented me from carrying this out. First, I had to wait more than eight days before I could attempt to send my bitcoin from Coinbase to my wallet. (I had already linked my bank account.) Second, when I finally attempted it, the transfer was flagged as suspicious and my ability to even attempt a transfer was blocked, and it remains blocked to this day. There was nothing suspicious about my attempt to transfer the bitcoin. I had tried to send it to my wallet at Exodus, a very reputable entity. For some incomprehensible reason, this was deemed suspicious by Coinbase! Despite having spoken to two different Coinbase representatives, the freeze remains in place. The thing that truly surprises me is that Coinbase is recommended by Investopedia, among others!

Don't bother wasting your time and money

list_of_reviews.review_title: I decided to use Coinbase several weeks…
list_of_reviews.review: I decided to use Coinbase several weeks ago to purchase $3K of bitcoin. After that, I planned to send all of the crypto to a trusted wallet (Exodus) for safekeeping. But delays due to Coinbase's ineptitude prevented me from carrying this out. First, I had to wait more than eight days before I could attempt to send my bitcoin from Coinbase to my wallet. (I had already linked my bank account.) Second, when I finally attempted it, the transfer was flagged as suspicious and my ability to even attempt a transfer was blocked, and it remains blocked to this day. There was nothing suspicious about my attempt to transfer the bitcoin. I had tried to send it to my wallet at Exodus, a very reputable entity. For some incomprehensible reason, this was deemed suspicious by Coinbase! Despite having spoken to two different Coinbase representatives, the freeze remains in place. The thing that truly surprises me is that Coinbase is recommended by Investopedia, among others!

If enough of us report them maybe something will be done when they start feeling the heat from federal authorities. Maybe we can get our money back from these crooks. I am not covered for a refund Coinbase? This is how you treat your customer? I then asked to close my account straight  away.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Really simple easy and quick on…
list_of_reviews.review: Really simple easy and quick on deposits and withdrawals

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I could give this company zero…
list_of_reviews.review: If I could give this company zero stars, I would. My experience with them has been nothing short of abysmal. Their customer service is an absolute joke, and I genuinely feel like I should sue them for their discriminatory practices.After being a loyal customer for three years, they suddenly decided to freeze my account, claiming they couldn't verify my identity because my address didn't match their records. The reason? I live in the UK but am a citizen of another country, and they demand that I have a UK passport to proceed. Despite having valid identification from my home country, they refused to accept it and had the audacity to suggest that I should "get a UK ID."This is blatant discrimination and should be pursued legally. I have never experienced such terrible treatment from any company before. If I had more time, I would take this to court, but for now, I'm left with a frozen account and wasted money.This company is an absolute disgrace, and I strongly advise everyone to steer clear. Trust me, you don’t want to go through the nightmare I did. Never again!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Send to coinbase wallet denied, suspicious
list_of_reviews.review: First time coinbase/crypto user.  Set up coinbase wallet.  Connected wallet to coinbase.  Disconnected and reconnected to try to get a sense that this is correct wallet on coinbase.com.Since I want to remove all funds from coinbase custodial I did a send of "max" BTC to the coinbase wallet as shown on coinbase.com.  Then I got emails that said there was a security review, account locked, and transaction failed.  I spent hours with support to try to rectify this.The account is still locked, and I have initiated a recovery process.  Waiting for id review to come back.  Support could not give me a definitive answer as to why the transaction failed or why I was locked out of the account.It is my opinion that this is being done only because I wanted to send all of the funds to a wallet. Coinbase support have not been able to give me a reason for it.  I am concerned that coinbase may be another FTX and is actually insolvent.It has been my intent to move my funds to a wallet from the start.  Now I am even more concerned about using coinbase for anything.I am also contacting the SEC and FBI.  Coinbase is now regulated by the SEC as a broker/dealer and must adhere to their rules for custodial funds.  I will ask the FBI if there are any current investigations of coinbase.  I will see if I can file a criminal complaint with the FBI.
I really enjoy navigating through the app and it's easy to use. Definetely will recommend it to my friends.

Edit: Coinbase please be considerate of others and actually be a little more transparent please.. I know you guys are a genuine exchange and have got a lot of people to deal with but ever thing was sorted in the end and it only took nearly 6 months of my life, but still sorted....

list_of_reviews.review_title: Send to coinbase wallet denied, suspicious
list_of_reviews.review: First time coinbase/crypto user.  Set up coinbase wallet.  Connected wallet to coinbase.  Disconnected and reconnected to try to get a sense that this is correct wallet on coinbase.com.Since I want to remove all funds from coinbase custodial I did a send of "max" BTC to the coinbase wallet as shown on coinbase.com.  Then I got emails that said there was a security review, account locked, and transaction failed.  I spent hours with support to try to rectify this.The account is still locked, and I have initiated a recovery process.  Waiting for id review to come back.  Support could not give me a definitive answer as to why the transaction failed or why I was locked out of the account.It is my opinion that this is being done only because I wanted to send all of the funds to a wallet. Coinbase support have not been able to give me a reason for it.  I am concerned that coinbase may be another FTX and is actually insolvent.It has been my intent to move my funds to a wallet from the start.  Now I am even more concerned about using coinbase for anything.I am also contacting the SEC and FBI.  Coinbase is now regulated by the SEC as a broker/dealer and must adhere to their rules for custodial funds.  I will ask the FBI if there are any current investigations of coinbase.  I will see if I can file a criminal complaint with the FBI.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Would give negative stars if I can
list_of_reviews.review: Would give negative stars if I can. It’s a very incompetent exchange backed by very incompetent employees with only scripted responses. Coinbase lost a large lump sum of my USDC and refused to give it back to me. I swore it would be the last time I would ever use their crappy platform but had to recently use it again because I had no other choice. They withheld my funds and insisted they were already sent to my bank account. After speaking to 20+ employees, one who is actually knowledgeable finally transferred my case to the banking department. They eventually revert the transaction back to my coinbase account but provided no explanations for where my funds went.STAY AWAY AT ALL COST PLEASE!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Coinbase appear to have stolen my funds
list_of_reviews.review: Coinbase appear to have stolen my funds. I hope I am wrong but keep getting lied to and misled by customer services. I found the account very easy to use at first. Then I couldn’t do anything except see my balance since the account was under review. I went through the identification submission steps with them and was told this has been completed and verified and I could start using the account again. It turned out that wasn’t true. I went through this process a couple of times. Still no access. And Coinbase support refuse to tell me when I will hear back from anyone on this or whether I could be waiting indefinitely. I hope to be able to come back and update this review to something more positive if Coinbase finally resolves things but fear the only way left to gain access without waiting an underterminable period of time will be through the U.K. courts since my money effectively appears to have been stolen.

Update! My account is still blocked for nearly 4 weeks now. On 04/09 they responsed for my review, so I sent documents, but my face was partially covered by document, so I resent 05/09 once again. All was good and clear, 48 hours is gone and  there is still not verified my identity. ??#20242115

Anno 2024, is America still fearful of communists? Didn't even think about this when visiting Vietnam but their legal team think its a problem and now suspended my account. Compliance wants to see all kinds of docs. Please DYOR.
Great Job! You could not of made it more secure and Easy to set up an Coinbase account and start investing!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Shut down accounts without a reason
list_of_reviews.review: Shut down accounts without a reason, they give a diplomat answer in an email not explaining why they shut down your account. Also, their services are available to half the locations in the world, it doesnt make sense tbh, they only care about1st world countries, also, after shutting down my coinbase account, i downloaded coinbase wallet app, sent money to it, ad i havent received it. IDK why i keep trying with them, they  are the worst and i hope they get shut down soon and they all go broke and hungry.

So as a New Zealander, they let you sign up but after alot of searching around you are told that your 'region' is restricted ??  crypto is not illegal in NZ so this is utter rubbish.  You serve  multiple OECD countries in the world and NZ is of the G20 nations and you dont serve NZ ?   they told me you can send and receive crypto thats all  - versus deposit whatever thats supposed to me.  What a joke this company is

list_of_reviews.review_title: Curiosity killed the cat or in this case lost my direct deposit.
list_of_reviews.review: I have never been so unfortunate with any app as I have been with these criminals known as Coinbase. I entrusted them with my direct deposit only to have the first two deposits delivered successfully and the third deposit outright stolen from me. They lied to me saying that it was returned to my payrolll provider but they have NOT and I repeat have NOT recieved any such deposit or even a message from Coinbase and their Chat team has wasted hours of my time by telling me over and over again that it’ll appear in five to ten business days, but the bills don’t wait and it’s been over ten days and nothing. To anyone curious about crypto I highly recommend against using Coinbase and that they remember what curiosity did to the cat. Curiosity… you know the rest.

Ridiculous trade prices and constant errors on the app. You would expect a company charging this much to have an app that actually works! Very bad and I've stopped using. If I could rate lower then I would. Avoid.

Edit: Coinbase please be considerate of others and actually be a little more transparent please.. I know you guys are a genuine exchange and have got a lot of people to deal with but ever thing was sorted in the end and it only took nearly 6 months of my life, but still sorted....

I sold Litecoin, but the transaction is still pending. It’s been 21 hours, and I still haven’t received the money, and I also can’t use the sold Litecoins anymore. I’ve contacted support multiple times via chat, but each time they told me something different. Once they said the network is overloaded, and the next time it was your issues with Litecoin transactions. Many hours have passed, and no one from your customer service has contacted me. No one can tell me when the issue will be resolved. I used to be a loyal customer, but my opinion about your company is starting to change. You show no interest in my issue. Customer service repeats the same pre-prepared responses, and after 21 hours, I still don’t know what actually happened and why I haven’t received my money yet.case number:20267067
Coinbasd is the best exchange, there's no other relevant competitor, it offers cool earning tools and also rewards

list_of_reviews.review: Coinbase Wallet was awful.  They took two full months to eventually tell me that there was supposed fraudulent activity on my end, which made no sense at all.  I absolutely would not recommend this to anybody.  It was actually closer to 3 months where money had been transferred and they claimed they needed to do layers of security.  Please avoid at all costs.  The service rep did a good job communicating but otherwise it was a nightmare!!!!!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Hands Down Best Exchange Out There
list_of_reviews.review: If you are looking for a trustworthy exchange, use Coinbase 100%. I've been using them since 2018 and I've never had any problems. I mean once i got locked out of my account, and there wasn't much they could do about that, which was frustrating, but i got back in it, and it shows just how secure there platform is.  Be careful reading these reviews, Crypto is super high risk, and there are so many scammers and people out to try and get your money. 99% of the people here leaving bad reviews, clicked "connect wallet" somewhere they shouldn't have and someone on the internet wiped out their funds. So because they are mad about it they leave a bad review when in reality, it had nothing do do with Coinbase, and was their own fault. If you don't understand crypto, either don't get into it, or do tons of research so you understand it and can safeguard against potential losses. Personally, i have accounts on a few different exchanges, and Coinbase is the best. Coinbase One is also a really good deal, because you don't pay fees, you pay a tiny transaction fee, but like if i make a $100 purchase, in the end i have $99.90 in crypto, which is better than you will get anywhere else. All in all, Coinbase is the best. Thank you for coming to my Ted Talk

list_of_reviews.review_title: Coinbase generated trading transferred my assets
list_of_reviews.review: I have both coinbase and coinbase wallet.  I attempted to transfer a small portion of my holdings from the wallet back to coinbase.  The transaction was blacked and immediately another transaction was placed for the entire amount of my balance.  Not all my holdings were in one coin, so the attempt failed as there was not enough to cover the transaction.  Within seconds, 8 more attempts were made with lowering amounts until it hit a number that worked.  It transferred almost all my holdings to a remote wallet not associated with me.  This was done by a bot or virus that was in their system.  I have spoken with coinbase chat folks and they have no answers and my money is gone.  I have to assume others have and will have similar problems.  They do not have a secure site and I suspect it has been infected with some automatic system that will create orders when you try to place them.  This came from within their system and they have no answers or solutions.

My account was hacked on 9-18-24. I called and informed Coinbase and was given a case#.  I was supposed to be contacted in a week via email. I never received a email, so I called in today 9-27-24.  I have been locked out of my account since 9-18-24. I can’t access my account or receive emails from Coinbase via email to unlock the account. I was basically told to file a police report and check with your email provider to have your email checked out but they couldn’t help with anything else?? I just had fraud on my account and no help, guidance, possible reimbursement or any useful info!

Terrible customer support. It felt like the agents were not taking me seriously. I initiated a chat with a simple question, but the agent responded with irrelevant information. I repeated my question, only to receive several "Okay, let me check for you" responses before the agent disappeared. Then, another agent took over, and I experienced more of the same — repeated "let me check" messages followed by long pauses. Overall, I wasted around two hours.

list_of_reviews.review: I’ve always used coinbase with much pleasure because it seemed secure.I’ve even promoted It at friends.At this moment coinbase suggest you should press the ‘claim-button’ for the use of coinbase ONE. After test-period they will withold 25 euro a month, where they can find it.This whole experience looks scammy and a bitt much on the rest of the cryptoworld new apps. It seems very strongly they are in the need of money. Isn’t everybody.Should it not be a safeplace..? Or should it be a gambling site?

Coinbase Wallet was awful.  They took two full months to eventually tell me that there was supposed fraudulent activity on my end, which made no sense at all.  I absolutely would not recommend this to anybody.  It was actually closer to 3 months where money had been transferred and they claimed they needed to do layers of security.  Please avoid at all costs.  The service rep did a good job communicating but otherwise it was a nightmare!!!!!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Coinbase generated trading transferred my assets
list_of_reviews.review: I have both coinbase and coinbase wallet.  I attempted to transfer a small portion of my holdings from the wallet back to coinbase.  The transaction was blacked and immediately another transaction was placed for the entire amount of my balance.  Not all my holdings were in one coin, so the attempt failed as there was not enough to cover the transaction.  Within seconds, 8 more attempts were made with lowering amounts until it hit a number that worked.  It transferred almost all my holdings to a remote wallet not associated with me.  This was done by a bot or virus that was in their system.  I have spoken with coinbase chat folks and they have no answers and my money is gone.  I have to assume others have and will have similar problems.  They do not have a secure site and I suspect it has been infected with some automatic system that will create orders when you try to place them.  This came from within their system and they have no answers or solutions.
Very easy to use platform, quick transactions,great help with quick response and no I'm not a bot to big them up 😂started with coinbase being new to crypto and found well laid out 10/10

Terrible customer support. It felt like the agents were not taking me seriously. I initiated a chat with a simple question, but the agent responded with irrelevant information. I repeated my question, only to receive several "Okay, let me check for you" responses before the agent disappeared. Then, another agent took over, and I experienced more of the same — repeated "let me check" messages followed by long pauses. Overall, I wasted around two hours.
I haven't been on Coinbase for a long time and now I joined and I forgot my password, but with Coinbase I quickly found a new one and I additionally protected my account. 5star.

My account was hacked on 9-18-24. I called and informed Coinbase and was given a case#.  I was supposed to be contacted in a week via email. I never received a email, so I called in today 9-27-24.  I have been locked out of my account since 9-18-24. I can’t access my account or receive emails from Coinbase via email to unlock the account. I was basically told to file a police report and check with your email provider to have your email checked out but they couldn’t help with anything else?? I just had fraud on my account and no help, guidance, possible reimbursement or any useful info!

I canceled my coinbase one trial 3-4 days ahead of its renewal but coinbase still charged me $29..99.I went to their chat support on the website they denied my claim and said no money was taken out. I have both screenshots from chats & Screenshots from my bank account clearly showing coinbase charge.If coinbase keeps denying this I will take them to small consumer court now.

list_of_reviews.review_title: FRAUD Will do what they want with your money
list_of_reviews.review: Ridiculous company. I buy crypto only to be told that my money will be on hold for a month? Being told it’s safety reasons but not being told any actual info as to why?. Apparently it’s all their system but no one can fix it and release MY money? Fraudulent behaviour. Happily takes your money but refuses to help after they decide to hold it?
New customer to coinbase.Hopefull that it continues on the upward trend.
Easy to buy and sale crypto currency and regulated by uk government. So it is safe and secure.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't rely on them for business accounts
list_of_reviews.review: They will kill your business for no reason..We have had a Coinbase corporate account for years but recently they suspended us over their automated ID system accidentally picking up the "issued by" date as the "Expired date". Surely something so trivial would be fixed within days? Right? It's now two months later.Despite 10+ emails/attempts to contact support, multiple re-uploads, begging support on Twitter, trying to teweet to the CEO on Twitter, they are still unable to find someone in the entire Coinbase company that is able to manually look at a totally valid ID.This company is completely unaccountable.Do NOT trust your business with Coinbase. Once you fall through the cracks in their system, their support is completely inadequate and non existent. Put your funds somewhere else. Anywhere else.Edit: After posting this review they got back to us quickly, and instead of fixing the ID issue they retaliated by just closing our account instead. Nasty, horrible company

Easy to use - just venturing into understanding how this all works, and so far it seems fairly straightforward

list_of_reviews.review_title: Did Coinbase SCAM ME?! 1 year process.
list_of_reviews.review: This is going to be a long article, so I apologize. First of all, I've been trying to get support from Coinbase for 1 year, REALLY 1 YEAR.I was using a Coinbase Merchant account, I received payments in cryptocurrency from my customers and I was usually transferring to external wallets. Everything is normal until here. One day I wanted to transfer from my Coinbase Merchant account to my Coinbase account. Hold on tight, MY MONEY LOST. My money is really missing and I have been trying to get support for 1 year. There is absolutely no solution. From my Coinbase Merchant account to my Coinbase account, between 2 Coinbase services, my money disappeared. They say your account is restricted, I have spoken to KYC side 3-4 times via email. I have sent information and documents many times, they may or may not respond to an e-mail after 2 months. There is no solution there either.Live support does not offer a solution. Classic messages like we forwarded it to the team, don't worry, wait for our e-mail. I have been waiting for an e-mail since our last conversation and it has not arrived for 2 weeks.As a result, I was probably scammed. In 1 year, people create apartments, I have not received support and solutions from Coinbase in 1 year.Maybe Coinbase is good for you now, but you can understand me when you have a problem.Now they will probably ask me for a case number or something like that or they will say contact us through Coinbase. In short, empty messages. I leave my case numbers in this message: 19212767, 18627239, 17361507, 17499994, 17301559These are just the ones that caught my eye in my e-mail address. There is more, and there are also many live support calls.
Ik gebruik Coinbase al een tijdje voor crypto-valuta changing, trading & withdrawl Fiat-Money also buying these with Fiat-Money - it's still working fantastic! Recommend to everyone.
User friendly to access the new cryptocurrency and invest in existing market

list_of_reviews.review_title: Coinbase support was shockingly unaware of the features of Coinbase
list_of_reviews.review: I chatted with Coinbase support because I was withdrawing a substantial amount of crypto from a Coinbase Vault, which (after a 48 hr hold) should have been deposited into my Coinbase primary balance. It's an internal transfer within Coinbase. The support agent didn't even seem aware that Coinbase has a vault feature because she kept asking for the transaction # and gave me irrelevant information about transfers between Coinbase and external wallets. After 2 hours back and forth, she gave me no indication of when this transaction would go through, which was worrying and frustrating, so I ended the chat. I continue researching for hours, and eventually find out that Coinbase sends emails to every email associated with my account, and every single email needs to approve the vault withdrawal before it goes through. This is not clearly instructed anywhere, and in fact, the approval links are glitchy and the second approval will give you a popup message that says you already approved. Had the support agent actually read my short description of my problem, and knew how Coinbase vaults work, she could have helped me get this transaction moving. This was such a terrible, insensitive, unhelpful Coinbase support experience that I'll likely cancel my Coinbase One membership.
Was a simple transaction. Completed within a minute. Would recommend.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Coinbase generated trading transferred my assets
list_of_reviews.review: I have both coinbase and coinbase wallet.  I attempted to transfer a small portion of my holdings from the wallet back to coinbase.  The transaction was blacked and immediately another transaction was placed for the entire amount of my balance.  Not all my holdings were in one coin, so the attempt failed as there was not enough to cover the transaction.  Within seconds, 8 more attempts were made with lowering amounts until it hit a number that worked.  It transferred almost all my holdings to a remote wallet not associated with me.  This was done by a bot or virus that was in their system.  I have spoken with coinbase chat folks and they have no answers and my money is gone.  I have to assume others have and will have similar problems.  They do not have a secure site and I suspect it has been infected with some automatic system that will create orders when you try to place them.  This came from within their system and they have no answers or solutions.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Hands Down Best Exchange Out There
list_of_reviews.review: If you are looking for a trustworthy exchange, use Coinbase 100%. I've been using them since 2018 and I've never had any problems. I mean once i got locked out of my account, and there wasn't much they could do about that, which was frustrating, but i got back in it, and it shows just how secure there platform is.  Be careful reading these reviews, Crypto is super high risk, and there are so many scammers and people out to try and get your money. 99% of the people here leaving bad reviews, clicked "connect wallet" somewhere they shouldn't have and someone on the internet wiped out their funds. So because they are mad about it they leave a bad review when in reality, it had nothing do do with Coinbase, and was their own fault. If you don't understand crypto, either don't get into it, or do tons of research so you understand it and can safeguard against potential losses. Personally, i have accounts on a few different exchanges, and Coinbase is the best. Coinbase One is also a really good deal, because you don't pay fees, you pay a tiny transaction fee, but like if i make a $100 purchase, in the end i have $99.90 in crypto, which is better than you will get anywhere else. All in all, Coinbase is the best. Thank you for coming to my Ted Talk
